trans-unit.source: Implements a markup extension that enables application authors to customize control styles based on the current system theme.
This class is a markup extension implementation.

Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code.

This extension supports the [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
XAML Text Usage
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension"></xref> class, using the specified assembly name.
The assembly name string.
Gets or sets a string setting a particular naming convention to identify which dictionary applies for a particular theme.
XAML Text Usage
For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/themedictionary-markup-extension.md).
The assembly name string.
Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.
For <xref href="System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension"></xref>, this is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value for a particular theme dictionary extension.

This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `ThemeResourceDictionary` extension values during object creation.
This implementation relies on services based on the passed `serviceProvider`.
It must not be `null`.
The `serviceProvider` object is expected to implement <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver>.
An object that can provide services for the markup extension.
This service is expected to provide results for <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver"></xref>.
The object value to set on the property where the extension is applied.
The <xref href="System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension.AssemblyName"></xref> property is `null`.
You must set this value during construction or before using the <xref href="System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension.ProvideValue(System.IServiceProvider)"></xref> method.
-or-
serviceProvider is `null` or does not provide a service for .
-or-
serviceProvider specifies a target type that does not match .
